name: intercom
title: Intercom
description: Manage contacts, conversations, and tickets in Intercom
setup_instructions: To connect Intercom, you need OAuth2 credentials from the Intercom Developer Hub.

fields.name: client_id
fields.label: Client ID
fields.help:
1. Go to Intercom Developer Hub
2. Create a new app
3. Set Redirect URI to: http://localhost:9876/callback
4. Copy the Client ID

fields.name: client_secret
fields.label: Client Secret
fields.help: Copy the Client Secret from your Intercom app
